name: Stress Shooter
description:
In a world of competitive shooters, lots of people are pro. Sometimes, it just seems like you can't win, what with the 6-year olds with aimbots and the career gamers, you  just... want to...

(Insert rage sound effects)

Oh look, there's the computer. On a wall. Shattered into a million pieces (just like your dreams of comp).

On the other hand, Stress Shooter (SS) is a simple game. Blow stuff up. Timestop. Teleport. Blow more stuff up. Oh, and did I mention...

INFINITE AMMO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Controls:

WASD and arrow keys for movement.

Left-click to shoot. Right click or F to use ironsights.

B for binoculars (you can still fire).

E for teleport gun.

Esc to leave menu/enter menu.

Menu is a timestop where you can still fire.
